comment.body: @Flyman: Топить за сепаратизм же. Чем на большее количество незалежных государств распадётся рашка, тем большая достигнута децентрализация.

Full-text search ^.^
> Would be interesting to see browser-based full-text search. For example, a robot can build index once in a week and embed it in zite files, and then every user can enter the zite and perform any searches inside that index.
Maaan, please calm down. What's wrong?

I'm using both google and ddg, and sometimes searx_me. +1 to alternatives are good. In current state of ZN, search is not that popular because there are not much zites at all, and everyone already have zerome + 0chan + few othets in their favourite list. I'm opening Bwoi & Kaffeine periodically just to see if there are some new features, but not to find something as I know there's currently nothing to find.
